properties.description: A listening ear with support of a job club, assistance with CVs, volunteering chats, digital skills and more. Refreshments served.
properties.title: A Wee Welcome In

properties.address: Main Street, West Kilbride, North Ayrshire KA23 9LJ
properties.description: Free Wi-Fi, soup and sandwich and other refreshments available! Newspapers, board games and toys for toddlers. Why not bring your own craft? Please note that the Church is also open on a Tuesday morning from 10.30am for our weekly Coffee morning - all welcome. Sunday Service is at 10.30am with hot drinks afterwards. Please go to our website to see when the building is also open at other times: wkpc.church
properties.title: Warm Hub
